backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister actor with access control, storage mixins, and extensive ERP/CRM/HRMS data type definitions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to frontend files, components, and tests for verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of multiple frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/ACTIVITY_2_DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST: Deployment checklist detailing required steps, verification points, and readiness checks for Activity 2.
frontend/ACTIVITY_3_OPTION_1_SPEC_TEMPLA: Template for specifying requirements and UI/Backend needs for Activity 3 Option 1.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file bootstrapping the frontend and loading the main React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routing, providers, authentication handling, and layout including the new /wallets route.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryMa: Provides UI to list, create, edit, and delete product categories using dialog forms and query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderManag: Displays all orders with status, totals, and details, allowing inline status updates via a select control.
frontend/src/components/admin/Organizati: Lists organizations and provides a dialog form to create new ones with name and description.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductMan: Manages products including listing, adding, editing, and deleting, with fields for pricing, stock, category, and metadata.
frontend/src/components/crm/ContactManag: Handles listing, creating, editing, and deleting contacts with identity-linked ownership and detailed contact fields.
frontend/src/components/crm/LeadManageme: Manages sales leads with creation, editing, stage updates, revenue estimates, and contact linkage.
frontend/src/components/crm/OpportunityM: Component for listing, creating, editing, and deleting sales opportunities with form handling and stage/probability management.
frontend/src/components/crm/PipelineOver: Displays pipeline metrics and lead distribution across stages using dashboard data and simple visual charts.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentReadin: Displays an admin-only readiness banner showing setup status for access control and Stripe, with recommendations if incomplete.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a GitHub link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the main navigation bar with authentication actions, admin links, cart/wallet/order access, and organization switching.
frontend/src/components/hrms/AttendanceM: Placeholder UI for future attendance tracking with a simple card and message.
frontend/src/components/hrms/DepartmentM: Full CRUD interface for departments including dialogs, forms, and table listing.
frontend/src/components/hrms/EmployeeMan: Component for creating, editing, and deleting employees, pulling department data and using a form dialog.
frontend/src/components/hrms/LeaveManage: Displays pending leave requests and allows approving or rejecting them with action buttons.
frontend/src/components/hrms/PayrollMana: Placeholder card indicating payroll processing features to be added later.
frontend/src/components/hrms/Performance: Placeholder component showing that performance tracking functionality is coming soon.
frontend/src/components/OrganizationSwit: Dropdown for selecting the active organization, showing loading state and organization list.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter and save a basic profile with name input.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin-only modal for configuring Stripe with a secret key and allowed countries when not yet set up.
frontend/src/components/WalletManagement: Manages organization wallets, allowing creation, deletion, and listing with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/WalletSummary.ts: Shows a summary of organization wallet balances and recent transactions, with auto-refresh and error states.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: Provides a cart context with item management, persistence in localStorage, and computed totals.
frontend/src/contexts/OrganizationContex: Manages active organization selection, persistence, and query invalidation tied to user identity and org changes.
frontend/src/contexts/WalletConnectorCon: Handles wallet connector selection, availability checks, and connection lifecycle with stored state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides identity management via Internet Identity with login, logout, and persisted session handling.
Custom hook syncing React state with localStorage using JSON serialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls into React Query hooks for deployment readiness, admin checks, Stripe config, and other domain data.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletConnector.ts: Re-exports wallet connector hook for convenience.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining CSS variables for light and dark themes across UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Activity3Requirements: Admin-only page for entering, storing, and generating build instructions for Activity 3 requirements with clipboard copy and draft management.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Displays admin-only analytics and management tabs for products, categories, orders, organizations, and wallets.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Handles shopping cart checkout flow, supporting Stripe and ICP payments with wallet connection logic.
frontend/src/pages/CrmDashboard.tsx: Admin CRM dashboard showing contact, lead, and opportunity stats with management tabs.
frontend/src/pages/HrmsDashboard.tsx: Admin HRMS dashboard providing employee, department, attendance, payroll, and performance management views.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Displays the user's orders with status, dates, and cancel actions, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a failure message after unsuccessful payment with navigation options to cart or home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Clears the cart on load and displays a payment success confirmation with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Renders a product catalog with search, category filtering, loading states, and add-to-cart functionality.
frontend/src/pages/WalletOverviewPage.ts: Displays wallet summaries for the selected organization with loading, error, and empty states, plus aggregated totals.
frontend/src/types/erp-types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for ERP entities such as products, orders, CRM objects, employees, and payroll.
frontend/src/utils/formatIdentity.ts: Utility to truncate identity strings by preserving prefix and suffix segments.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for getting, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/walletErrors.ts: Normalizes various backend and authorization wallet errors into short, user-facing messages.
frontend/src/wallets/connectors/oisyConn: Implements the Oisy wallet connector with availability checks, connect/disconnect logic, and connection state retrieval.
frontend/src/wallets/connectors/plugConn: Implements the Plug wallet connector handling installation checks, connect/disconnect flows, and identity retrieval.
frontend/src/wallets/inpageProviders.d.t: Declares TypeScript ambient types for in-page Plug and Oisy wallet providers on window.ic.
frontend/src/wallets/walletConnectorRegi: Registers available wallet connectors and provides lookup utilities by connector ID.
frontend/src/wallets/walletConnectorType: Defines wallet connector interfaces, provider IDs, availability states, and identity info types.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with extended color system, themes, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the current project state, feature progress, and requirements for implementing wallet-related frontend and backend features.
